{{cpp/numeric/random/normal_distribution/title|mean, stddev}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/normal_distribution/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 | num=1 |
RealType mean() const;
}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 | num=2 |
RealType stddev() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the parameters the distribution was constructed with.

@1@ Returns the mean {{math|μ}} distribution parameter. The mean specifies the location of the peak. The default value is {{c|0.0}}.

@2@ Returns the deviation {{math|σ}} distribution parameter. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The mean {{math|μ}} distribution parameter.

@2@ The deviation {{math|σ}} distribution parameter.
